<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Populate calculated stage values for SR and NEG (Note: This script is for May 2022 release)</description>
        <name>Populate stage on SR/NEG (May 2022)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[// Update all Qualified SRs sourcing stage value to 'Qualification started'
var sourcingQuery = Sourcing.SOURCING_STAGE + '=' +
    '^OR' + Sourcing.SOURCING_STAGE + '=' + Sourcing.STAGE_NOT_STARTED +
    '^' + Sourcing.ACTIVE + '=true' +
    '^' + Sourcing.STATUS + '!=' + Sourcing.STATUS_PENDING_REVIEW;

var sourcingGr = new Sourcing().getByQuery(sourcingQuery);
sourcingGr.setValue(Sourcing.SOURCING_STAGE, Sourcing.STAGE_QUALIFICATION_STARTED);
sourcingGr.updateMultiple();

// Update all Qualified NEGs negotiation stage value to 'Qualification started'
var negotiationQuery = Negotiation.NEGOTIATION_STAGE + '=' +
    '^OR' + Negotiation.NEGOTIATION_STAGE + '=' + Negotiation.STAGE_NOT_STARTED +
    '^' + Negotiation.ACTIVE + '=true' +
    '^' + Negotiation.STATE + '!=' + Negotiation.STATE_PLANNED;

var negotiationGr = new Negotiation().getByQuery(negotiationQuery);
while (negotiationGr.next()) {
    var negStage = new NegotiationUtil(negotiationGr).calculateNegotiationStage();

    negotiationGr.setValue(Negotiation.NEGOTIATION_STAGE, negStage);
    negotiationGr.update();
}]]></script>
